001package imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings;
002
003import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
004
005/**
006 * Implementing classes provide the Jacobian matrix for the associated mapping.
007 * 
008 * @author WB
009 *
010 */
011public interface Jacobian {
012        
013        /**
014         * <p>
015         * Returns the Jacobian matrix for this mapping, evaluated at the given 2D
016         * point. See Appendix Sec. D.1.1 of [1] for more details.
017         * </p>
018         * <p>
019         * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
020         * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
021         * </p>
022         * 
023         * @param pnt the 2D position to calculate the Jacobian for
024         * @return the Jacobian matrix
025         */
026        public double[][] getJacobian(Pnt2d pnt);
027
028}
